notice.title: About this project
notice.description: This project uses the public API jsonplaceholder.typicode to demonstrate HTTP requests and data integration in React. It was developed for educational purposes to learn React and its practical applications.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.subtitle: Explore a modern project with React, Tailwind CSS and more

integration.title: JSONPlaceholder Integration
integration.description: This project integrates the public JSONPlaceholder API, allowing you to practice HTTP requests, data management and API consumption in a real React application.
